message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.IT, cs.CC 

The paper deals with the problem of online bandit linear optimization, which is a fundamental problem in machine learning and optimization. The paper presents an algorithm that achieves optimal regret bounds for this problem, which is of interest to researchers in the fields of machine learning, optimization, and theoretical computer science. The most likely sub-category is cs.LG (Machine Learning), as the paper deals with a fundamental problem in this field. Other likely sub-categories include cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.IT (Information Theory), and cs.CC (Computational Complexity), as the paper uses tools from convex geometry and provides theoretical bounds on the performance of the algorithm.
